website_summaries.verdict: Good quality, lightweight vest suitable for daily wear and outdoor activities. Excellent value.
pros: Features a polyester shell and lining with a stand-collar design to keep your neck warm
Quilted and windproof, with one interior pocket and zippered hand pockets
cons: Polyester fill instead of actual down

customer_reviews.title: Great and stylish vests
customer_reviews.text: Great and stylish vests. I actually bought three but had to return them because I live in Florida and it's hot here. I only wear my vest when I'm going somewhere with AC. I love the product though D recommend it to anyone who wants warmth and still look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Petit Bois

customer_reviews.title: Too poofy.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I'm a little dude and it was puffier than I thought it would be. I looked like a little stylish version of the Michelin man.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wray

customer_reviews.title: Well made, simple styling and excellent fit over wool blazer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a plain down vest with adequate length to cover a man's heavy wool blazer. This vest is a perfect casual-ware vest for the cool winter weather. My large down vest breaks at the waist and is too short to wear over a blazer. I purchased this vest (XL) because it was longer than most down vest made for men. I am very pleased and can wear a wool sweater and blazer without having to wear an overcoat. The fact that it zips on the left side does not annoy me. Over all, I am very pleased with my purchase. The price is also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: I threw out the tags and feel like I have to keep it
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth on whether or not to keep it but decided to keep it, now wishing I had returned it. One of the pockets came unsewed and has a hole in it from just wearing it around the house. Unfortunately, I threw out the tags and feel like I have to keep it, will probably donate it to a homeless shelter. p.s. its also very shiny and kind of 'girly'
customer_reviews.author: J Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Rating based on price!
customer_reviews.text: As people have mentioned, the zipper is on the left side. Overall the vest fits and feels nice, and I appreciate the checkered liner for sure. I'm 5'11, 177lbs, athletic build, and the vest fits very nicely. For those saying the vest is 'too puffy,' then why did you order a vest that is clearly puffy? I think the amount of puffiness for what I was looking for is just right. Time will tell if the quality holds for any length, but for the price I am happy so far; no holes in the pockets or anything of the sort.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking vest, and great quality. Just a couple issues - one, it’s made like a women’s vest, which my husband really doesn’t care for. The zipper is on the wrong side. Also, it seems to be a tiny bit big. He usually wears a medium, and this is a little wide. He could maybe wear a small in this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jenfabulous

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is on oppisite side as if it was a womans
customer_reviews.text: This XL fits as expected.unfortunately there are holes in all 3 pockets. The zipper is on the opposite side. (woman's ) quality is nice but the zipper is a big dissapointment. My husband has to get used to it... If we decide to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Puffer vest light weight and and warm. Fit, true too size. Inside pocket, 2 zip up side pockets. Zipper front, and yes zips opposite of usual....will get used to it. Nice red color, seems to be be made well. Will get a green one too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect vest.
customer_reviews.text: I looked in several stores to find one like this. No such luck. I ordered this one and it is perfect. I like the attention to detail to the design. Also it has zippered pockets which is a must have. It's the perfect vest for when it gets chilly again here. I am so happy that I made this purchase. The seller even reached out to me to make sure I was happy. FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Miles

customer_reviews.title: the ALL AMERICAN way
customer_reviews.text: I DID like this jacket after receiving and trying it on. But the trying to zip the center IMMEDIATELY got stuck. Then trying to resolve the problem got me IRRITATED! Having to waist my time ordering a boat jacket since there was no other choice. Knowing if keeping the jacket and THEN the zipper malfunctioned I'd have to deal with it the "ALL AMERICAN WAY!" I'd be screwed and maybe after playing pushbuttons with Amazon I might be lucky to get a refund? If not I'D BE SCREWED?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price - zipper on the left !
customer_reviews.text: I like the lining. Nice touch and the interior pocket The zipper is on the wrong side (left) soo odd... All the zippers are a bit rough to use. Not smooth It runs a bit smaller than the amazon essential vests - the XL barely fits me but is long. So it runs narrow and long.. nice quality for a low price. Better material than amazon essential vest. Not bad for $35
customer_reviews.author: HoneyFitz

customer_reviews.title: I live in Colorado and it’s been like 13 degrees or colder since the middle of December ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado and it’s been like 13 degrees or colder since the middle of December this Best was perfect with a flannel shirt I don’t like to over heat when I’m driving, great purchase I think I’m gonna get another one
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Dislectic zipper
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this made in China Vest is a bit small for it’s stated size. I can live with that, but the obvious shortcoming is that the zipper is sewed onto the wrong side. Most any zippered garment I have ever had has the zipper on the right side, this vest has it on the left side. And yes, it IS a men’s vest.
customer_reviews.author: Vine Hill Chef

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small
customer_reviews.text: This vest is a nice vest which is comfortable. Despite the criticism about the zipper placement, this doesn’t affect me as I don’t really care if either on the left or right side. One thing is that I normally am a large and this seems to fot a bit tight. I should have gotten the XL but I am really looking forward to lose a couple of pounds and a XL would definitely be too big. I hope that this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: fisherzman69

customer_reviews.title: Great vest but....
customer_reviews.text: I like this vest, fits right, warm but the zipper might be an issue. When first putting the zipper together it seems difficult at times to get things lined up. If it proves to be a problem over the next couple of weeks I ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jaredee`

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Great Company
customer_reviews.text: The vest is beautiful - fine in veery detail. Very attractive, I have received many positive comments. Seller very responsive and easy to deal with. Wondefull customer service. Recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, I ordered an XL based on other reviews and should have ordered a L. Zipper is on the left side so that’s taking a bit to get used to but no biggie. Very nice and warm vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Spend a few more bucks
customer_reviews.text: I’m like the Michelin man in this thing and it’s only a size medium. It’s obviously made in China because the zipper is on the other side. I mean don’t give me wrong it will keep you warm, but it does not look very good.
customer_reviews.author: John Nelson Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quality in construction not quite there
customer_reviews.text: Qualities - The vest fits very well. It is quite warm and comfortable. Issues - Main zip is opposite to normal zips with the pull on the left. Bottom of zip is tricky to engage. Left pocket zip when closed completely gets locked in that position. NOT GOOD, if you need to get something out of it in a hurry. It does open eventually but causes a great degree of annoyance. I would have to warn people away from this product unless it is proven that this was a one off situation.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good product with delivery as stated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for my father for XMAS. It was late arriving, but he lives in a small city. It is as described & fine. My key finder did NOT arrive as was claimed. Is now at the post office & I am unable to pick it up. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: POOF

customer_reviews.title: Over all quality seems good.
customer_reviews.text: They run small. Buy the next size larger than you would normally wear. Over all quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ted Buehring

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Another gift but this one wasn’t even remotely successful. It was too large for the occupant even though I got the smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: kody

customer_reviews.title: Add a small design on the vest
customer_reviews.text: Love the look Need some Type of logo or embroidery on it.. how many times do I have to send this review.... It keep popping up
customer_reviews.author: Jaytee davis

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: It’s an extremely light weight jacket. And bright enough to make me visible when I walk the dog at night
customer_reviews.author: Dav Lev

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color. I’m an extra large all day and was a little tight with just a t-shirt under. Zipper was on the left hand and does not work very well. Typically zippers are on the right for men. Very awkward for me since I’m male. I think overall the product is poorly made and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got this item two weeks ago and it is great. One of the best product I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: quique   ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Vest
customer_reviews.text: I'm a short guy about 5'4" so its a bit long in length for me, Ideally I would benefit from a medium , but then I would not be able to zip the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm stylish vest
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm vest, a little snug in shoulders and zipper is on wrong side
customer_reviews.author: Lyle D. Reiss

customer_reviews.title: great vest
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars! this is the first vest i have worn and i absolutely love it! fits as expected and really keeps you warm. the black will pretty much go with any thing. im glad i took a leap and purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits great I'm 100 lbs 5ft 6 hard to find things ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great I'm 100 lbs 5ft 6 hard to find things that fit perfect this vest was a good choice I suggest it to anyone who's looking for a nice warm comfortable vest
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product,
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, I absolutely love your product. Love it love it love it I will recommend this comfortable we're to my family and friends it. Thank you for such a affordable and comfortable product.
customer_reviews.author: james bond

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on wrong side for guys
customer_reviews.text: Made in China for a big lady. Front zipper on wrong side for guys.
customer_reviews.author: James L McKay

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Small fit. I wear XL day in and out. I couldn't get this XL zipped up with no shirt on.
customer_reviews.author: St. Charles

customer_reviews.title: The item is comfortable. I thought this was an item for men ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is comfortable. I thought this was an item for men but it zips from the left and not the right side. Not sure about that. Do not like it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Stuffing inside comes together into one chunk
customer_reviews.text: The vest looks nice, but when you put it on all the stuffing inside blobs together into one big chunk. Wouldn't reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: tatyana l.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Zips on the wrong side as in female clothing in fact I think it is for a woman
customer_reviews.author: privateer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper???
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why the zipper is on the left side? Not use to zipping things with my left hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vest, inside is nice too
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our son. Fit as expected, was soft & comfy. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Neenee

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Ran pretty true to size and wore comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Franco

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: enjoy this much and did not pay a lot.U pay for a brand name..
customer_reviews.author: Claudius C.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this product. Only issue is the zipper being on the wrong side.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable lined vest, not to hot, not too cold.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for active people who get a little too warm with a full jacket. Looked at alot of vests and this was one of the few that was lined, and it is just perfect for work. Size runs a little small, so if you are a men's medium you will need a large.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Product deliverers what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Product fit fine. Liked the lining and look of the vest Bought it for the look of the vest
customer_reviews.author: Jr12inman

customer_reviews.title: Light grey vest
customer_reviews.text: It isn't white. It is a very light grey. I was really looking for a white vest for my friend. He kept it because he really needed it, but the color description is a little deceptive. Get a size up if you plan to later under it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jennings

customer_reviews.title: snug and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable vest; a little snug on a big man, but not too tight. Very nice navy blue color. Stitching is great. Zipper is on opposite side of traditional men's clothing. Surprisingly warm, too. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: carlin0325

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend, it looks really good and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: down vest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas gift so I cannot answer any questions about the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Crowdis

customer_reviews.title: Great vest !!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this vest as a gift and my son-in-law really likes this vest !!
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. Great looking, awesome material and the color was as expected. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: roxcas55

customer_reviews.title: great vest.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this vest, it is just the right size to wear a long sleeve western shirt under it or even a hooded sweatshirt. mens medium is what shirt size he wears and it has just enough room, not too snug and not too baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new vest and he wears it every day. I need to purchase a few more vests in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the value, tight around the arms
customer_reviews.text: Good product but they use an elastic band in the arms and at the bottom that I feel are too tight. I’ve debated trying to cut them but am afraid that it would ruin it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great looking vest
customer_reviews.text: great looking vest, decent in terms of keeping warm. 4 stars becuase the size was slightly to big for me
customer_reviews.author: Jovany Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, good fit, reasonable price. Sleeve openings are elasticized. Waist is also elasticized making for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Rambler

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest - fits well
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to order since I didn't want to mess with returning if it didn't fit well. I'm 6'1' 215 and wear a large in most tops - their large fit perfectly. The zippers work well, the seams seem to be sewn well - all in all I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: The zip is on the left side.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the zipper being on the left side. Had I known that it was, I would not have ordered it. I would have preferred to have it on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not the best,
customer_reviews.text: The zipper stopped working in 4 days. Not the best for the price that it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inside lining ripped after wearing it once
customer_reviews.text: This fits ell and is warm and practical. Inside lining ripped right down the middle after wearing it one time. Very disappointing and I hope this is an aberration because I was planning on ordering different colors!!
customer_reviews.author: David Northup

customer_reviews.title: Zipper, zips to the left
customer_reviews.text: Zipper designed for lefty. I thought i brought a female vest but it was listed as male. Not sure the zipper will last this season.
customer_reviews.author: cassie curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Fit is very nice. Very warm only part to get used to is zipper in the left
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Vest
customer_reviews.text: I like this vest & use it pretty much every day. It fits well & is warm enough for me. The only problem I have is that there is already a hole inside one of the pockets. I will probably have to patch it so it doesn't get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: found it interesting men's vest zipper was on the left
customer_reviews.author: P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love it ,got the black one ,will get a brown one when I can afford it ..awesome vest
customer_reviews.author: Dana Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Just too small
customer_reviews.text: fit of this jacket is way too small. had to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: david S.

customer_reviews.title: Gift item
customer_reviews.text: This item is a gift that hasn’t been presented yet so I can’t answer some of your concerns. However, it arrived as scheduled, it looks good quality and I am looking forward to giving it as a special gift to a special friend.
customer_reviews.author: E. W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, fits as it should all around, and has zippers on the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, love this vest! Just took a little long to come in!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Uzzell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on the side, sewed it, then it ripped again..
customer_reviews.author: C Bass. IYAAOYAS

customer_reviews.title: Pocket size too small.
customer_reviews.text: Pocket’s size is too small, deepness should be required more deep so that full hand goes in. Which insist me to give 2 star. Very unhappy. I wanted to return but can’t coz I moved Canada. Its such a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Keltik

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my boyfriend perfectly! He normally wears a large, and I ordered him a large. He’s able to where a nice, thick sweater underneath, and it fits comfortably. The zippers are very strong ad sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on the wrong side!
customer_reviews.text: As many of the reviews here stated - a bit on the long side and the zipper being on the wrong side (left) prompted me to immediately repackage and return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CambyMan

customer_reviews.title: It has a rip/town seam.
customer_reviews.text: The vest was a Christmas gift and 6 days later it has a very big hole in a pocket. We are disappointed because the vest is nice, however, the ripping material/seams is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The product is stylish and warm enough for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Florent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was somewhat small in the waist. I contacted the company and there were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Pocket is made poorly. Easily ripped. Not worth the money. Can definitely find better quality for same price. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: It's okay..
customer_reviews.text: The zipper didn't work upon first opening and I had to fix it so it would work right. For the price I should have bought a brand I know.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s warm and looks nice. No visible branding which I like
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The feathers dont come out like other jackets like that do.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son for xmas he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: The sizes they are not correct.
customer_reviews.text: They should say that the vest sizes are not correct
customer_reviews.author: Robert.a. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Like But No So Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and comfort, but zipper came off not to long after wearing a few times. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pelham

customer_reviews.title: Fits well ! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the vest . Only preference would be solid color liner.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest for the price, zipper is backwards
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. I prefer snug over loose. 6’ 200lb male. Medium The zipper is on the wrong side though.
customer_reviews.author: A. calhoun

customer_reviews.title: The color in the image is not the color you receive.
customer_reviews.text: The color is off. It's a dark forest green in the image but came in olive green. Decided to keep it since I like the color anyways.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking vest and my hubby says it feels and looks great
customer_reviews.author: RaKell Ferre"

customer_reviews.title: Be warned, these run super small
customer_reviews.text: An XL will be for a medium or small American man. I would say the XL would fit a chest size of 32 or 34
customer_reviews.author: Tony Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very nice vest
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes the vest and the price was way less than K—ls.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Glowacki

customer_reviews.title: Fit is a bit snug, but not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great for wear on a cool day. Zipper was installed with the tab on the left-as in women’s garnets.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's "ok"
customer_reviews.text: It is relatively lightweight. While zippers can go both ways, the man's zipper is on the left. A little unusual.
customer_reviews.author: RBC17

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving it 1 star because you have to give it a star to review. I wore this one time. The seams began to unravel and split. It’s a strange fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: The style of the jacket was amazing. The material of the fabric is great. I also liked the available pockets.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good low cost vest. Not the best one you can buy, but a little better than others at the price point.

customer_reviews.title: Not Totally happy
customer_reviews.text: Even though this product was advertised as a man's vest, the zipper is installed as if it's a woman's vest.

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I REQUESTED THE PRODUCT THAT INDICATES THE PHOTO HOWEVER I GOT A COMBINED VEST WITH BLACK, BAD EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good guality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. He does deliveries at night and it’s perfect to keep him warm

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money. I'm 6'1" , 220lbs, and the XL fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im so delighted and happy to get this vest and it is looks wonderfull , fit me good 👍

customer_reviews.title: Vest Jacket that Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how good its fits. Its worth what I paid for.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on wrong side
customer_reviews.text: Appears to look like a quality garment until I noticed the zipper is on the wrong side for a men’s vest.
customer_reviews.author: Grant M

customer_reviews.title: It should work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize zipper would be on left side (as women’s typically are).
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hoenisch

customer_reviews.title: FIT AND THE ZIPPER ON THE WRONG SIDE
customer_reviews.text: ZIPPER ON THE WRONG SIDE FOR A GUY IT IS SET UP FOR A WOMEN OR A GIRL
customer_reviews.author: Scotteutsey

product_meta.title: Vcansion Men's Outdoor Casual Stand Collar Padded Vest Coats
feature_bullets: Shell: 100% Polyester; Lining: 100% Polyester; Filling: 100% Polyester
Three Pockets - 2 side pockets and 1 inside pocket keep hands warm
Hand Wash / Dry Cleaning / Hang Dry / Do Not Bleach / Hang Dry.Stand-collar- Stand-collar design will increase your visual height and keep your neck warm.
Durable polyester fabric and parallel quilted design with fine sewing craft prevent leakage of imitation cotton stuffing

Nice looking warm vest is ideal to pair with tee shirts, heavy coats, jeans, sport pants, boots, or other casual wear for spring, fall or winter season, Occasion: Daily Wear, Work, Shopping, Holiday, Outing (Hiking, Cycling, Snowboarding, Skiing, Camping, etc.)
ATTENTION:all items are US SIZE for selection, not Asian SIZE.But few items tag shows the Asian Standard and old logo
